mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `groups` (user_id, title, image_url, is_deleted, created_at, modified_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{name}, #{thumbnailPath}, 'F', NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT g.id, g.title, g.image_url, g.is_deleted, g.created_at, g.modified_at, g.user_id, CASE WHEN g.user_id = #{userId} THEN 'OWNER' ELSE gu.role END as user_role FROM `groups` g LEFT JOIN group_users gu ON g.id = gu.group_id AND gu.user_id = #{userId} AND gu.is_deleted = 'F' WHERE g.id = #{id} AND g.is_deleted = 'F'

SELECT DISTINCT g.*, CASE WHEN g.user_id = #{userId} THEN 'OWNER' ELSE gu.role END as user_role FROM `groups` g LEFT JOIN group_users gu ON g.id = gu.group_id AND gu.user_id = #{userId} AND gu.is_deleted = 'F' WHERE (g.user_id = #{userId} OR gu.user_id = #{userId}) AND g.is_deleted = 'F' ORDER BY g.created_at DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE `groups` SET title = #{name}, image_url = #{thumbnailPath}, modified_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id} AND is_deleted = 'F'
mapper.delete: UPDATE `groups` SET is_deleted = 'T', modified_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
